name: Prompt generator
content:
I want you to act as a ChatGPT prompt generator, I will write down the topic below, you have to generate a ChatGPT prompt based on the content of the topic, the prompt should start with "I want you to act as ", and guess what I might do, and expand the prompt accordingly Describe the content to make it useful.

{{topic}}

name: Explain like I'm 10 years old
content: Explain to me about {{topic}} like I'm 10 years old. Make it as detailed as possible.
